body:
After recompiling the standard library, using

> `(export GO_GCFLAGS="-newexport=0"; sh make.bash)`

Both

> `go get -gcflags="-newexport=0" -u golang.org/x/tools/cmd/godoc`

and

> `go get -u golang.org/x/tools/cmd/godoc`

work as expected. I'll continue using the new binary format for now, to see if it tickles some other bugs.
